roleset.name: cause to become used up, tired

example.name: use up, no instrument
example.text: But increasing volatility in the sector has exhausted investors who try to follow its dips and swings .

propbank.arg: investors who try to follow its dips and swings

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: Last year Acer Peripherals invested in a combination website and magazine , but they exhausted their capital within three months .

example.name: nominal rel: exhaustion
example.text: You can say " eat or to not eat " . You can also say " to eat fast or to eat slowly " . However , you can not say " eat , to not eat , to eat fast " because this violates the principle of classification of logic , the principle of exhaustion of classification of logic , and the principle that different types of things can not be compared of logic .

roleset.note: EXHAUST-V NOTES: Frames file for 'exhaust' based on financial subcorpus; nominal 'exhaustion' based on BOLT-7. Member of VNcls amuse-31.1. (from exhaust.01-v)
EXHAUSTING-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. (from exhausting.01-j)
EXHAUSTED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SMS. (from exhausted.01-j)
EXHAUSTION-N NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from exhaustion.01-n)
